name: Daily Window Yield % by Line
description: Day-to-day true process yield by AOI window, per line. Quickly exposes drift/spikes.
sql:
SELECT
  "Report Date"::date AS d,
  "Line" AS line,
  SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
  SUM("NG Windows") AS ng_windows,
  (SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) - SUM("NG Windows"))
    / NULLIF(SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")),0) * 100.0 AS window_yield_pct
FROM moat_dpm
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

name: Weekly DPM Trend by Assembly
description: Defects per million windows over time for each assembly—spot the worst offenders and improvement after fixes.
sql:
WITH w AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('week', "Report Date")::date AS wk,
    "Model Name" AS model_name,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ng_windows
  FROM moat_dpm
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  wk,
  model_name,
  ng_windows / NULLIF(windows,0) * 1e6 AS dpm
FROM w
ORDER BY wk, model_name;

name: Top 10 Assemblies by DPM (selected period)
description: Pareto-style ranking—where most true defects are concentrated.
sql:
WITH f AS (
  SELECT
    "Model Name" AS model_name,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ng_windows
  FROM moat_dpm
  WHERE "Report Date" >= :from AND "Report Date" < :to
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  model_name,
  ng_windows / NULLIF(windows,0) * 1e6 AS dpm
FROM f
ORDER BY dpm DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10;

name: Line vs Line Window Yield for a Selected Assembly
description: For one assembly, which line produces better yield (process quality) across a period.
sql:
SELECT
  "Line" AS line,
  SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
  SUM("NG Windows") AS ng_windows,
  (SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) - SUM("NG Windows"))
    / NULLIF(SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")),0) * 100.0 AS window_yield_pct
FROM moat_dpm
WHERE "Model Name" = :model
  AND "Report Date" >= :from AND "Report Date" < :to
GROUP BY line
ORDER BY line;

name: Defects per Board (u-chart friendly) by Line
description: Normalized defects load per board—great for SPC and workload impact.
sql:
SELECT
  "Report Date"::date AS d,
  "Line" AS line,
  SUM("Total Boards") AS boards,
  SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw,
  SUM("NG Windows") / NULLIF(SUM("Total Boards"),0) AS defects_per_board
FROM moat_dpm
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

name: Windows/Board vs DPM (scatter)
description: Normalization check—are high DPM values just because programs have far more windows, or is the process really worse?
sql:
WITH g AS (
  SELECT
    "Model Name" AS model_name,
    "Line" AS line,
    SUM("Total Boards") AS boards,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw
  FROM moat_dpm
  WHERE "Report Date" >= :from AND "Report Date" < :to
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  model_name,
  line,
  windows / NULLIF(boards,0) AS windows_per_board,
  ngw / NULLIF(windows,0) * 1e6 AS dpm
FROM g
WHERE boards > 0 AND windows > 0;

name: Yield Heatmap (Line × Assembly)
description: “In-sync” view—who’s great/struggling per assembly across lines.
sql:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    "Line" AS line,
    "Model Name" AS model_name,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw
  FROM moat_dpm
  WHERE "Report Date" >= :from AND "Report Date" < :to
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  line,
  model_name,
  (windows - ngw) / NULLIF(windows,0) * 100.0 AS window_yield_pct
FROM base;

name: Rolling 7-Day Average Yield (per Line)
description: Smoothed trend; separates signal from day-to-day noise.
sql:
WITH d AS (
  SELECT
    "Report Date"::date AS d,
    "Line" AS line,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw
  FROM moat_dpm
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
x AS (
  SELECT
    d,
    line,
    (windows - ngw) / NULLIF(windows,0) * 100.0 AS window_yield_pct
  FROM d
)
SELECT
  d,
  line,
  AVG(window_yield_pct) OVER (
    PARTITION BY line
    ORDER BY d
    ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS window_yield_pct_roll7
FROM x
ORDER BY d, line;

name: Throughput vs Quality: Boards Inspected vs Yield (bubble)
description: Which lines sustain high quality and high throughput.
sql:
WITH s AS (
  SELECT
    "Line" AS line,
    SUM("Total Boards") AS boards,
    SUM(COALESCE("Total Windows", "Windows per board" * "Total Boards")) AS windows,
    SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw
  FROM moat_dpm
  WHERE "Report Date" >= :from AND "Report Date" < :to
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  line,
  boards,
  (windows - ngw) / NULLIF(windows,0) * 100.0 AS window_yield_pct
FROM s;

name: Control Chart (u-Chart approximation) – Defects/Board per Line
description: SPC-style alerting for special-cause variation by line.
sql:
SELECT
  "Report Date"::date AS d,
  "Line" AS line,
  SUM("Total Boards") AS boards,
  SUM("NG Windows") AS ngw,
  SUM("NG Windows") / NULLIF(SUM("Total Boards"),0) AS u_value -- defects/board
FROM moat_dpm
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;
notes: Compute mean and UCL/LCL per line after fetching results: UCL = ū + 3 * sqrt(ū / n_i), LCL = max(0, ū - 3 * sqrt(ū / n_i)), where n_i is the boards inspected on that day.
